src:
Lovec Anton po nesreči ustrelil kolega Branka
Nesreča med pregonom divjih prašičev in jelenjadi. Krogla se je odbila v 63-letnega lovca Branka Jarca.
04 Nov 2019, 06:30 by Jaroslav Jankovič



GETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTOObmočje strela čakajočega lovca je 90 °. FOTO: Guliver/getty Images



Lovci goniči oziroma trajbarji morajo obvezno nositi odsevne jopiče. FOTO: Oste Bakal



GETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTOLovski psi preženejo divje prašiče pred lovce FOTO: Guliver/getty Getty Images



GETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTODivjad je zelo hitra, zato mora biti lovec pri strelu zelo spreten. FOTO: Guliver/Getty Images


ŽUŽEMBERK – Nesreče pri lovu so redke, pa vendarle se zgodi, da lovčeva krogla, namenjena jelenu, srnjaku ali divjemu prašiču, zaide, se odbije in zadene kolega lovca. Prav to se je zgodilo lovcem na nedeljskem skupinskem lovu na jelenjad in divje prašiče v lovišču LD Plešivica - Žužemberk.Po neuradnih informacijah je nekaj deset lovcev iz te družine v jutranjih urah začelo klasični pregon na veliko divjad. Ob 10. uri in 15 minut naj bi lovec Anton Šeme streljal proti divjadi, delec krogle se je odbil in priletel v prsni koš 63-letnega lovca Branka Jarca iz Trebče vasi, da je negiben obležal sredi gozda.


Lovski psi preženejo divje prašiče pred lovce FOTO: Guliver/getty Getty ImagesGETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTO

Po vojaško bi se opisanemu nesrečnemu dogodku reklo prijateljski ogenj, v lovskem žargonu pa rikoše oziroma ricochet, kar pomeni odboj. Kot nam je povedal lovski strokovnjak, je zelo redko, da bi delec krogle, ki se odbije od nečesa trdega, v nepredvidljivi smeri zadel lovca. Precej večja verjetnost je menda, da vas v nevihti zadene strela.Poškodovanega lovca so na kraju nesreče oskrbeli reševalci nujne medicinske pomoči ZD Novo mesto in ga predali v oskrbo ekipi helikopterske nujne medicinske pomoči. S helikopterjem Slovenske vojske so ga nato prepeljali v UKC Ljubljana. Po besedah gospodarja lovske koče LD Plešivica - Žužemberk Mitje Longarja menda ni v smrtni nevarnosti.Ker se je nesreča zgodila v gozdu pri naselju Klečet, so reševalcem pri prenosu ranjenega lovca do reševalnega vozila pomagali Gasilci PGD Šmihel pri Žužemberku, policisti pa sprožili preiskavo o incidentu, ki bo pokazala, ali se je lov odvijal po vseh pravilih. Z ugotovitvami okoliščin morebitnega kaznivega dejanja povzročitve splošne nevarnosti bodo v prihodnjih dneh obvestili tožilstvo.
Lovci na stojišču in trajberji
Pogon na veliko divjad se vselej odvija po strogo določenih pravilih skupinskega lova, kjer se lovci po predhodnem natančnem dogovoru razdelijo v dve osnovni skupini. Prvi so lovci, ki so razporejeni na točno določenih stojiščih, kjer čakajo divjad. Tako so čakajoči lovci drugi od drugega oddaljeni od 100 do 150 metrov, odvisno od terena in števila lovcev. Druga skupina so goniči s psi, žargonsko imenovani trajberji, se pravi tisti, ki naganjajo divjad proti čakajočim lovcem. Pravilo veleva, da morajo biti oblečeni v svetleče oranžne ali rumene telovnike, medtem ko morajo imeti čakajoči lovci okoli klobuka vsaj odsevni trak. Natančno je določen tudi kot, pod katerim lahko streljajo. Običajno so trajberji mlajši lovci in ne streljajo, ni pa izključeno.Z izjemo gospodarja lovske koče LD Plešivica - Žužemberk Mitje Longarja, ki pa ni sodeloval v nedeljskem lovu in ne pozna


Lovci goniči oziroma trajbarji morajo obvezno nositi odsevne jopiče. FOTO: Oste Bakal

podrobnosti, sta bila gospodar in starešina lovske družine po telefonu nedosegljiva. Po logiki stvari lahko ugibamo, da je bil mlajši, Šeme, trajber, medtem ko je verjetno Jarc čakal na stojišču. Toda prav lahko bi bilo tudi obratno, saj se pogosto starejši lovci, ki so v dobri kondiciji, pridružijo trajberjem.Kot so nam potrdili lovci, je imel Jarc veliko srečo. »Če bi ga zadela cela krogla, bi se stvar verjetno končala tragično,« nam je povedal izkušeni starejši član zelene bratovščine.

Hunter Anton accidentally shoots his colleague Branko
Accident between the prosecution of feral pigs and deer. The ball bounced into 63-year-old fighter Branko Capricorn.
04 Nov 2019, 06:30 by Jaroslav Jankovic

Hunters of hounds or trappers must wear reflective vests. PHOTO: Oste Bakal



GETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTOL Dogs chase wild pigs before hunters PHOTO: Gulliver / getty Getty Images



GETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTODivad is very fast, so the hunter must be very adept at shooting. PHOTO: Gulliver / Getty Images


ZHUZEMBERK - Hunting accidents are rare, but it happens that a hunter's bullet aimed at a deer, roe deer, or wild boar catches, bounces off, and hits a fellow hunter. This is exactly what happened to hunters on a Sunday group hunt for deer and wild boar in the hunting ground of LD Plešivica - Žužemberk.According to unofficial information, several dozen hunters from this family started the classic hunt for large game in the morning. At 10 o'clock and 15 minutes, hunter Anton Shema was supposed to fire at the game, a bullet of a bullet bounced off and hit the chest of 63-year-old hunter Branko Jarc from Trebca village to lay motionless in the middle of the forest.


Hunting dogs chase wild pigs before hunters PHOTO: Gulliver / getty Getty ImagesGETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTO

According to the military description of the unfortunate event would be called friendly fire, in hunting jargon it would be ricochet or ricochet, which means repulsion. As a hunting expert has told us, it is very rare for a particle of a bullet that bounces off of something hard to hit the hunter in an unpredictable direction. It is much more likely that you are struck by lightning in the storm. The injured hunter was taken to the scene by an ambulance of the Novo mesto Emergency Medical Services and handed over to the helicopter emergency medical team. He was then transported to the UKC Ljubljana with a Slovenian Army helicopter. According to the owner of the hunting lodge LD Plešivica - Žužemberk, Mitja Longar is probably not in mortal danger.As the accident occurred in the forest near the village of Klecet, rescuers were assisted in the transfer of the injured hunter to the ambulance by PGD Šmihel firefighters at Žužemberk, and police opened an investigation into the incident , which will show if the hunt has taken place by all rules. The prosecution will be informed of the circumstances of a possible criminal offense of causing a general danger.
Stallion hunters and gamblers
Many game drives are always conducted according to strict rules of group hunting, where hunters are divided into two basic groups by prior agreement. The first is the hunters, who are deployed at precisely designated stands where wildlife awaits. Thus, the waiting hunters are 100 to 150 meters apart depending on the terrain and the number of hunters. The second group is dog hunters, jargon-named trappers, that is, those who chase game against waiting hunters. The rule states that they must be dressed in shiny orange or yellow vests, while waiting hunters must have at least a reflective strap around their hat. The angle at which they can shoot is also specified. Typically, traberers are younger hunters and do not shoot, but it is not excluded. With the exception of the hunter lodge LD Plešivica - Žužemberk Mitja Longar, who did not participate in the Sunday hunt and does not know

details, the master and elder of the hunting family were unavailable by phone. By the logic of things, we can assume that he was younger, Scheme, a Traiber, while probably Capricorn was waiting at the stand. But it could also be the other way around, as often older, well-trained hunters join the trappers. As the hunters have confirmed, Capricorn has been very lucky. "If he was hit by a whole bullet, the thing would probably end tragically," an experienced senior member of the Green Brotherhood told us.
